column4: Does anybody else have any idea what to do when it hangs up on the login screen?
You should try booting with acpi=off
When the boot menu comes up press "e" then go down to the kernel and press "e", then add "acpi=off" at the end of the long line where it has quiet and splash at

okay, try it again with "acpi=off", "noapic", and "nolapic"
